Ranil Wickremesinghe to contest Sri Lanka Presidential polls as independent candidate
content: Ranil Wickremesinghe filed his nomination for the upcoming Sri Lankan presidential election as an independent candidate as his lawyers submitted a bail deposit on Friday. The election will be pivotal for Sri Lanka's economic recovery and debt restructuring program with international creditors, including progress involving countries such as India, France, Japan, and China.
summary: Ranil Wickremesinghe filed his nomination for the upcoming Sri Lankan presidential election as an independent candidate as his lawyers submitted a bail deposit on Friday. The election will be pivotal for Sri Lanka's economic recovery and debt restructuring program with international creditors, including progress involving countries such as India, France, Japan, and China.

title: Pakistan ministers in China, plead for debt relief
content: During a visit to China, Pakistan finance minister Muhammad Aurangzeb met with Chinese counterpart Lan Fo'an to seek relief from Pakistan's power sector debts. The Pakistani delegation requested an eight-year extension for repaying energy debts, conversion of US dollar-based interest payments to Chinese currency, and reductions in interest rates for both CPEC and non-CPEC Chinese-funded projects.
summary: During a visit to China, Pakistan finance minister Muhammad Aurangzeb met with Chinese counterpart Lan Fo'an to seek relief from Pakistan's power sector debts. The Pakistani delegation requested an eight-year extension for repaying energy debts, conversion of US dollar-based interest payments to Chinese currency, and reductions in interest rates for both CPEC and non-CPEC Chinese-funded projects.

'What happened to any time, any place?', asks Kamala after Trump backs off his commitment to debate in September
content: Vice President Kamala Harris has questioned Donald Trump’s commitment to a debate scheduled for September 10 after his apparent backpedalling. Trump’s team cited “political chaos” surrounding Biden’s exit and Harris’s provisional status as reasons for reconsideration. Harris, however, insists on the debate, accusing Trump of avoiding the clash. Trump hints at preferring Fox News for the debate but has not confirmed his participation.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris has questioned Donald Trump’s commitment to a debate scheduled for September 10 after his apparent backpedalling. Trump’s team cited “political chaos” surrounding Biden’s exit and Harris’s provisional status as reasons for reconsideration. Harris, however, insists on the debate, accusing Trump of avoiding the clash. Trump hints at preferring Fox News for the debate but has not confirmed his participation.

title: Unesco body holds Russia responsible for destruction of Ukrainian cultural heritage
'Most used rocket' SpaceX's Falcon 9 gets green light to return to Space
content: ​​The FAA said on Friday that it found no public safety concerns related to the anomaly that occurred during the unsuccessful launch on July 11, allowing the rocket to return to flight operations while the comprehensive investigation proceeds.
summary: ​​The FAA said on Friday that it found no public safety concerns related to the anomaly that occurred during the unsuccessful launch on July 11, allowing the rocket to return to flight operations while the comprehensive investigation proceeds.

title: 'Not helpful': How Nikki Haley criticized attacks on Kamala Harris over gender and race
content: Nikki Haley has criticised attacks on Vice President Kamala Harris based on her race and gender, urging focus on her policy shortcomings instead. In a CNN interview, Haley highlighted Harris's lack of accomplishments, failed handling of illegal immigration, and progressive stance, which she believes makes Harris a less effective choice than Biden.
summary: Nikki Haley has criticised attacks on Vice President Kamala Harris based on her race and gender, urging focus on her policy shortcomings instead. In a CNN interview, Haley highlighted Harris's lack of accomplishments, failed handling of illegal immigration, and progressive stance, which she believes makes Harris a less effective choice than Biden.

title: Prince Harry 'won't bring wife Meghan Markle back' to UK, here's why
content: Prince Harry has announced that Meghan Markle will not accompany him on future UK visits due to severe safety concerns linked to media scrutiny. In an ITV interview, Harry expressed fears over potential threats influenced by tabloid coverage. He also discussed the broader impact of media harassment on their lives and reflected on the support from his late grandmother, Queen Elizabeth II.
summary: Prince Harry has announced that Meghan Markle will not accompany him on future UK visits due to severe safety concerns linked to media scrutiny. In an ITV interview, Harry expressed fears over potential threats influenced by tabloid coverage. He also discussed the broader impact of media harassment on their lives and reflected on the support from his late grandmother, Queen Elizabeth II.
